snippet.title: RIG Riot - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist RIG Riot on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3180340/RIG_Riot
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/mDqseqTYHH

RIG Riot is a roguelike third-person mech-action shooter. Travel through increasingly difficult stages and collect weapons and mods with powerful effects. Discover unique synergies that suit your playstyle, and travel the megastructure in search of rare permanent parts to perfect your RIG.

#mech #mecha #mechgames #roguelike #roguelite #steam #indiegame #indiegames #indiedev
